trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control displays an advertisement on the page.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>kontrollen viser en reklame på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AdCreatedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en AdCreatedEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
